group_1.textRight: Orikooo!
I'm so sorry, Oriko!@I'm so, so sorry!

group_1.textLeft: Kirika?@What's wrong?

group_1.textRight: It's the tea, Oriko!@The tea you sent me out to get!

group_1.textLeft: What about it?

group_1.textRight: Well, I bought it...
And then I fought with blondie and her@red-headed friend...and they ruined it!
I'm sorry! I'm so sorry!@You asked me to get you tea but I failed!

group_1.textLeft: Oh, is that all...?

group_1.textRight: I tried to go back and get it, but—

group_1.textLeft: It's fine.@That is the least of our worries.
(The tea means nothing to me...)
(I just needed you here,@safe at home...)

group_1.textRight: Sorry...
I tried to get some different tea@so I wouldn't come back empty-handed...
...but the only thing open was a supermarket.

group_1.textLeft: There's no need to apologize.
Mmm... See?@This tea smells quite nice.

group_1.textRight: Oriko, you... *Sniffle*...

group_1.textLeft: You take jam in your tea, don't you, Kirika?

group_1.textRight: ...Uh huh...! *Sniffle*
So blondie—Mami, was it?
She was with her redheaded friend.
It turns out they don't really know much@about Kamihama, either.
But they could feel something was off in@Kamihama, so they were checking it out.

group_1.textLeft: Is that so?

group_1.textRight: Honestly, I agree with them.@Kamihama is a weird little place.
It's crawling with Witches...

group_1.textLeft: (So...Kirika...@Mami and her friends...)
(They all sensed that something is@going on in Kamihama like I did...)

group_1.textRight: Oriko?
It's...@It's the tea, isn't it?!

group_1.textLeft: What...?

group_1.textRight: It... It's just tea from the supermarket!@It must be terrible!
I'm so sorry! I'll go out right awa—er...@Tomorrow!
I'll go back to Kamihama tomorrow and@get you the tea you like!

group_1.textLeft: Kirika, please.
It's fine.@Don't worry yourself.
We have plenty of tea, your @errand was a complete success.
There's nothing to make up for.

group_1.textRight: If...you say so...

group_1.textLeft: (I don't know who or what's behind it...@But something's happening in Kamihama.)
(You've only just come back to me...)
(I hope I never have to send @you back to Kamihama again.)

group_1.narration: ...I need your help@to save this world...
If you were no longer in the world once@we save it, I don't know what I'd do.
